description: User or service account that initiated the recorded change.
Timestamp when the update occurred and was recorded in the log.
Application module or functional area responsible for the update.
Primary business identifier of the affected record; likely varies by module and may represent different entities; confirm with SME.
Text of the SQL statement executed to apply the update for auditing and troubleshooting.
Name of the automated job, script, or procedure that performed the change, if applicable.
Secondary business key providing additional context for the affected record (such as a line item or sub-identifier); confirm with SME.
Unique identifier for this log entry, used for tracing and reference.
Flag indicating this entry is exempt from automated cleanup or archival; likely used to retain critical records; confirm with SME.
